messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com
I want to break all agreements I made with Satan in regards to sexual sin fornication halortry adultery masturbation and pornography I want to be free from all sexual sin and lust

We're here to support you in your journey towards healing. You can pray for deliverance and break those agreements by renouncing the sexual sins you've mentioned. 

Here's a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, I come before you today to renounce all sexual sins, including fornication, adultery, masturbation, and pornography. In the name of Jesus Christ, I break all agreements I have made with Satan regarding these sins. I ask for your forgiveness and for the strength to walk in purity and freedom from lust. Fill me with your Holy Spirit and guide me on this path to healing."

If you need further assistance or someone to talk to, feel free to reach out!
I want to repent to God for not being married before sex I want God to lead my life from this day forward so Satan doesn't lead my life anymore and I don't lead anyone into further sin

It's wonderful that you want to repent and seek God's guidance. You can express your repentance through prayer. Hereâ€™s a prayer you might find helpful:

"Dear God, I come before you with a humble heart, asking for your forgiveness for engaging in sexual sin outside of marriage. I repent for not honoring your design for relationships. Please lead my life from this day forward, and help me to walk in your ways. I ask for your strength to resist temptation and to not lead others into sin. Fill me with your Holy Spirit and guide me in living a life that pleases you. Thank you for your grace and mercy."

If you need more support or resources, just let me know!
I know I took sin into my marriage because marriage doesn't free you from sin that you had before marriage this lust has lead me for years down roads I never wanted to go down

It's important to acknowledge the struggles you've faced, and it's a positive step that you're seeking healing. Remember, God offers grace and forgiveness, and you can ask for His help in overcoming these challenges.

You might consider praying something like this:

"Lord, I recognize that I have brought sin into my marriage, and I ask for your forgiveness. I have struggled with lust for years, and I don't want to continue down this path. Please help me to break free from these patterns and to heal from the past. Guide me in my marriage and help me to honor my spouse and our commitment to each other. I trust in your grace to transform my heart and lead me towards purity."

If you need further support or resources, feel free to reach out!
Some accountability would be nice

Accountability can be a powerful tool in your journey towards healing and purity. We can help connect you with a support group or provide resources that encourage accountability. 

Would you like more information on how to join a support group or find someone to talk to about your struggles? Let me know how I can assist you!
Yes

Great! We can help you find a support group where you can connect with others who are on a similar journey. These groups often provide a safe space for sharing experiences and encouraging one another.

If you have any specific preferences or questions about the type of support you're looking for, please let me know!
Just an accountability group

I understand you're looking for an accountability group. We can help you connect with one that aligns with your needs. 

Please let me know if you have any specific preferences, such as meeting times or formats (in-person or online), and I'll do my best to assist you!
I would appreciate that I want all sexual curses broken off of me so I begin to live a pure life and be free from guilt and shame

It's wonderful that you're seeking to break free from those burdens and live a pure life. We can certainly support you in this journey. 

You might consider praying for the breaking of those curses and for God's strength to help you live in purity. Here's a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, I come before you today seeking freedom from all sexual curses and the guilt and shame that have weighed me down. In the name of Jesus Christ, I renounce all past sins and ask for your healing and restoration. Please fill me with your Holy Spirit and guide me towards a life of purity. I trust in your grace to transform my heart and lead me on the right path."

If you're looking for an accountability group, I can help you find one that focuses on healing and support in these areas. Let me know how you'd like to proceed!
I would appreciate any accountability group you can refer me to

I can help you connect with the Samson Society, which is a great accountability group for men seeking support in their journey towards sexual purity. They provide a space for men to be transparent without judgment and offer resources for healing and restoration.

If you're interested, I can guide you on how to get involved with them. Just let me know!
I'm interested

That's great to hear! To get involved with the Samson Society, you can visit their website to find local groups or online meetings. They offer a supportive community where you can share your experiences and receive encouragement from others who understand your journey.

If you need help navigating their site or have any questions about what to expect, feel free to ask!

I do need help navigating their site I want all idolatry cut out of my life especially sexual idolatry and any sexual agreements I have made with sexual partners and want the harlotry spirit cut from my marriage

I understand how important it is to seek freedom from those burdens. While I can't provide direct navigation assistance to the Samson Society's site, I can suggest that you look for sections related to "Find a Group" or "Get Involved." These areas typically provide information on how to connect with local or online support groups.

Additionally, you can also look for resources or prayers that focus on breaking agreements and cutting off any idolatry in your life. 

If you have specific questions about what you're finding or need further guidance, feel free to ask! I'm here to support you.
